availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND DIVIDED WE FALL
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE.
Louisville, 186.

Capt. Thomas Rowland Coy K. com Major June 14. 1864 vice Geo W. Drye resig: Jhon dischge
1 2. 3. 4. 5

1 Lt. Phillip Roberts com Capt. Coy K. June 14. 1864. vice Tho. Rowland promo:
1. 2. 3. 4 5

2 Lt. Tilford N. Bruner, com 1 Lt. Coy K. June 14. 1864 vice Phillip Roberts promot.
1. 2. 3. 4 5

2nd1st Lieut James S. Penkey com. Captain Coy I June 14/64 vice Alexr Smith resigned. discharged
1. 2. 3. 4 5

O. S. Thos. Graves com. 1 Lieut Compy I. June 14 1864 vice Jas. S. Pankey promo:
1. 2. 3. 4 5

2 Lt. Joseph D. Beatie Com. Captain Coy L. June 14. 1864. vice J. B. Fishback resig:
1. 2. 3. 4 5

O. S. Granville J. Vaught com. 2 Lt. Coy L. June 14. 1864. vice J. D Beatie promo:
1. 2. 3. 4 5.

Geo. H. Norton com Asst. Surg. June 14 1864 vice A. G. Huffman resig: hon dischged --
Write in relation to Excuse.

Hd qrs 1s Ky Cavl
Lost Mountain Ga
June 14th 1864
1 Cavy
Adams. S
Lt Col. Comd
Recommends that commissions be issued to sundry officers of the 1s Ky cavl to fill vacancies.

Coms issd & fowd July 9. 1864
L. B. No. 4 p. 321.
Recd A G O. 20 June 1864
